title: Nicaragua
subtitle: Surf. Party. Repeat. Trip for Two!
short_description: Soak up the sun in San Juan del Sur, Nicaragua. Surf world-class waves in the Pacific Ocean. Lounge by the pool and rest your head in a private room. Sip on unlimited beer and rum at the swim-up bar. Bring a friend or loved one â€” this trip is for two!
